definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: Hedgehog heard the grass move , It was snake.
sentences.chinese: 刺猬听到草嘻嘻索索的声音，蛇出现了。

sentences.english: The hedgehog only comes out at night to scurry around for a meal.
sentences.chinese: 刺猬只在夜间出来，到处匆匆地转，找寻食物。

sentences.english: The sound hedgehog's picked up is Saw-scale, also on the hunt!
sentences.chinese: 但刺猬听到的声音是同样在狩猎的蝰蛇。

sentences.english: The angel stared out at the rushing hedgerows.
sentences.chinese: 天使盯着匆匆逃命的刺猬们。

sentences.english: Fierce Welsh mercenaries, who fight unarmoured, equipped with a spear and capable of forming a defensive ring of spears.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士矛兵盔甲简陋，装备长矛，可列刺猬圆阵。

sentences.english: Countryside characters, Ed and Edwina Hedgehog, Tom Mouse, Sam Rabbit and Badger.
sentences.chinese: 农村字符，教育署及派驻刺猬，汤姆鼠，黄兔，獾。

sentences.english: Denizen: Bottle caps, Hamster, Bubble, Hedgehog.
When choosing a food to add to your hedgies diet the first thing is to READ THE LABEL.
sentences.chinese: 选择食物增至你的刺猬饮食中的第一件事是阅读标签。

sentences.english: The Hedgehog was actually a group of whirling dervish sort of bombs fired ahead of the attacking ship.
sentences.chinese: “刺猬”实际上就是向船的前方前发射迫击炮弹。

sentences.english: Another hedgehog, same apartment building a not-so-rich parlour formations.
sentences.chinese: 另一只刺猬，是同一栋公寓的富家千金帕洛玛。

sentences.english: A frightened hedgehog contracts its body into a ball .
sentences.chinese: 受惊的刺猬会把身体缩成一个球。

sentences.english: The balls were hedgehogs, and the mallets were flamingoes.
All hedgies have different personalities and tastes.
sentences.chinese: 所有刺猬都拥有不同的个性与口味。

sentences.english: So she went in search of her hedgehog .
sentences.chinese: 因此她就走了，找她的刺猬去了。

sentences.english: A hedgehog rolls itself into a ball when attacked.
sentences.chinese: 刺猬一受到攻击就蜷缩成一团。

definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
